Procedures and Stack: Assume you have an array of characters of 50 elements. You need to capitalize the first character of each word after a space and also count the number of words in the string. Write a procedure to pass this array by reference and implement the logic.

Suppose you have a dataset of Corona cases reported in Pakistan, which includes total number of infected people, number of deaths, people recovered, inf_male, inf_female, rec_male, rec_female for the last 30 days. Each day records only that day's information. Write a macro/procedure to find: (a) Calculate the number of cases recovered in terms of male & female of a day. Male_recovered = rec_male / people recovered, Female_recovered = rec_female / people recovered. (b) Calculate the number of infected cases in terms of male & female of a day. Male_infected = inf_male / infected people, Female_infected = inf_female / infected people. (c) Accumulate the total number of infected cases, number of deaths, people recovered in the last 30 days.

Implement the following pseudo-code in an x86 assembly program. Your program must maintain and clean the stack used for this program; don’t use ENTER/LEAVE instructions and LOCAL directive. int array[] = {10, 60, 20, 33, 72, 89, 45, 65, 72, 18}; int sample = 50; void main(){ int sum = 0; int index = 0; func1(index, &sum); } void func1(int i, int* s) { int arraySize = sizeof array / sizeof sample; while(i < arraySize) { if (array[i] <= sample) { *s += array[i]; } i++; } }
